h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Amber Prayer Beads Location
content: The Amber Prayer Beads can be found in the Flaming Mountains. It is along the Gray-Bronze Cart path during the Woods of Ember. You will find yourself in a cave along this path. Within the cave you can find a path with some lava on the right. Ignore the left path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Amber_Prayer_Beads.md', within the main section titled 'Amber Prayer Beads', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Amber Prayer Beads Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Amber Prayer Beads can be found in the Flaming Mountains. It is along the Gray-Bronze Cart path during the Woods of Ember. You will find yourself in a cave along this path. Within the cave you can find a path with some lava on the right. Ignore the left path.
